properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 12:12PM EST until January 25 at 7:28PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a flood warning for
the following rivers in Delaware...

Red Clay Creek At Wooddale affecting New Castle County

The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Red Clay Creek at Wooddale.
* until this evening...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 12:01 PM Saturday the stage was 6.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 7.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to rise to
near 7.2 feet by this afternoon.the river will fall below flood stage by this
afternoon.
* Impact...At 7.5 feet...Barley Mill Road begins to flood. Brandywine Springs
Park floods.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.2 feet on Sep 23
2003.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...Do not attempt to drive through flooded areas. The water may be
deeper than you think.
